content.text: Lankashiir was a planet of the Lankashiir system, within the Colonies region of the galaxy. During the Imperial Period, Lankashiir was under the control of the Galactic Empire. A planet thriving with forests, Lankashiir was home to Adion Lang, a lieutenant serving with the Imperial Security Bureau, and the Durasha family, a Human family with strong Imperial ties.
Lankashiir was first mentioned in the 1995 Star Wars Adventure Journal 8's short story A Certain Point of View, which was written by Charlene Newcomb.

elements.text: "A Certain Point of View"—Star Wars Adventure Journal 8
